thread.title: Here’s Some of the Best Sneakers on Display at London Fashion Week Men’s FW17
thread.title_full: Here’s Some of the Best Sneakers on Display at London Fashion Week Men’s FW17

author: Graeme Campbell
title: Here’s Some of the Best Sneakers on Display at London Fashion Week Men’s FW17
text:
Visit the original post to see all 18 images from this gallery. 
For the latest installment of our Highsnobiety street style series, we take to the damp streets of London and check out what the sneaker cognoscenti wore on their feet to the capital’s FW17 men’s fashion week.
Predictably, there’s strong representation from both Nike and adidas, with the Nike Air Max 97 and YEEZY Boost 350 V2 both making inevitable appearances. Other neat kicks on show include the Rihanna x FENTY PUMA velvet slider and Gosha Rubchinskiy x Vans Half Cab, while one lucky attendee has managed to get their hands on the much-coveted Vetements x Reebok Insta Pump Fury.
Peep our choice selections in the gallery above, and then find out what went down at A-COLD-WALL*’s industrial FW17 show.
Subscribe to Highsnobiety’s sneaker chatbot on Facebook to receive lightning quick updates on release dates, sneaker street style, shopping tips and more.
